duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency medical care in a clinical setting, addressing acute and life-threatening conditions.
Coordinate and perform intubations, anesthesia, and labor and delivery procedures as necessary.
Oversee and provide critical care to patients in need of immediate life-saving treatment.
Work with specialty backup teams including General Surgery, Ortho, OB/GYN, Urology, GI, Pulmonary/ICU, Tele Neuro, Nephrology, and Dialysis.
Collaborate with Advanced Practice Providers to ensure comprehensive care and coverage.
Develop treatment plans, respond to codes, and organize patient care in a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: Must be EM residency trained or ABEM/AOBEM certified/eligible
